org.middleheaven.chart
Interface Dataset

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<Series>, SeriesListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDataset
public interface Dataset
extends SeriesListener, java.lang.Iterable<Series>

A Dataset is a set of Series and the main block for building a chart. Charts are based in a single Dataset.
